description: Main.dart source code for a Flutter-based audiobook app, including UI components, themes, book catalog, and in-app purchase and playback management.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget initializing theme and home page

classes.name: MainTabView
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the tabbed interface, user preferences, and audiobook data

classes.name: StoreTab
classes.description: UI widget displaying available audiobooks for purchase

classes.name: LibraryTab
classes.description: UI widget showing user's purchased audiobooks and playback progress

classes.name: PlayerTab
classes.description: UI widget simulating an audiobook player with progress and controls

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for each widget

methods.name: purchaseAudiobook
methods.description: Simulates purchasing an audiobook and adds it to the library

methods.name: selectBookForPlayer
methods.description: Sets the selected audiobook for playback

methods.name: updatePlaybackPosition
methods.description: Updates the playback position for a specific audiobook

methods.name: durationFormat
methods.description: Formats seconds into readable duration strings
